BattleEffect: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.
SecondaryEffect: Protects all Pokémon on your team from damage that'd hit both Pokémon for one turn

Name: Wild Charge
BattleEffect: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.
SecondaryEffect: User takes recoil damage equal to 25% of the damage inflicted.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
BattleEffect: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
SecondaryEffect: Induces burn.

Name: Wing Attack
BattleEffect: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.
SecondaryEffect: No effect.

Name: Wish
BattleEffect: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by half the user's max HP.
SecondaryEffect: In 1 turn, it heals whatever Pokémon is in this position on the field's Hit Points by 50% of the maximum Hit Points.

Name: Withdraw
BattleEffect: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.
SecondaryEffect: Raises user's Defense one stage.

Name: Wonder Room
BattleEffect: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.
SecondaryEffect: Switches Defense & Special Defense for five turns for all Pokémon on the field

Name: Wood Hammer
BattleEffect: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
SecondaryEffect: User takes recoil damage equal to a third of the damage inflicted.

Name: Work Up
BattleEffect: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
SecondaryEffect: Raises user's Attack & Special Attack one stage.

Name: Worry Seed
BattleEffect: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.
SecondaryEffect: Changes the opponent's ability to Insomnia

Name: Wrap
BattleEffect: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.
SecondaryEffect: Traps opponent.

Name: Wring Out
BattleEffect: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move's power.
SecondaryEffect: Increases damage the higher the target's Hit Points

Name: X-Scissor
BattleEffect: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
SecondaryEffect: No effect.

Name: Yawn
BattleEffect: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.
SecondaryEffect: Target falls asleep during the next turn.

Name: Zap Cannon
BattleEffect: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
SecondaryEffect: May induce paralysis.

Name: Zen Headbutt
BattleEffect: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.
SecondaryEffect: May cause opponent to flinch.

Name: Zing Zap
BattleEffect: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.
SecondaryEffect: May cause opponent to flinch.

Name: Zippy Zap
BattleEffect: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.
SecondaryEffect: Always inflicts a Critical Hit
